column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////So here is the scoop - this place did taste different than the other two. The sauce is better
column2: but what gets it is the crust. Its really buttery and the sausage patty (my recommendation) is perfect on the the pie. Their pizza has what you pay for
column5: where the other guys tend to skimp on the meat. Also the other places crust sucks!!!
